name: Payton Tontz, Ph.D.
what_you_do: New Paradigm Psychology is an integrative body of teachings and healing modalities that helps people heal from a state of disconnection and fragmentation to a state of inner connection and wholeness.
who_you_serve: Individuals seeking psychological healing and transformation through integrative psychotherapy and self-study courses.
service_provided: 1:1 coaching, group programs, courses, speaking, consulting
current_projects: The Psychology of Awakening self-study online course, Planetary Upshift New Moon Meditations
bio: Dr. Payton Tontz holds a Ph.D. in East West Psychology and is a licensed Marriage and Family Therapist in California and Arizona.
business_focus: New Paradigm Psychology is an integrative body of teachings and healing modalities that helps people heal from a state of disconnection and fragmentation to a state of inner connection and wholeness. (integrative psychotherapy)
